properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
As I kneel before you,
as I bow my head
in prayer,
take this day,
make it yours
and fill me with your love.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Ave Maria,
gratia plena,
dominus tecum,
benedicta tu. x2

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All I have I give you,
every dream and
wish are yours,
Mother of Christ,
Mother of mine,
present them to my Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
As I kneel before you,
and I see your smiling face,
ev'ry thought, ev'ry word
is lost in your embrace.
